pages.title: Uraninite Ore
pages.text: Uraninite Ore is found underground and can be converted to $(l:materials/uraninite)Uraninite $(/l)to craft and fuel Reactors. There are multiple tiers of Uraninite Ore: $(li)poor is below level 64 $(li)normal is below level 20 $(li)dense is below level 0. $(p)Uraninite Ore is found in 1 to 5 block veins. An iron or better pickaxe is required to mine it and will produce Raw Uraninite. $(p)Energizing Uraninite Ore produce more Uraninite than mining Uraninite Ore with a Fortune 3 Pickaxe.

pages.title: Raw Uraninite
pages.text: Raw Uraninite can be smelted or blasted to create one Uraninite. It can be Energized create two Uraninite.

pages.title: Uraninite
pages.text: Uraninite is used to craft and fuel $(l:generators/reactor)Reactors $(/l).
